text: -PsarvA#Niq CandA(gm)#siq CandA(gm)#siq Kaluq vA aqgnEH priqyA taqnUH priqyayaiqvaina#M taqnuvAq pari# dadhAtiq vEdu#kOq vAsO# Bavatiqya EqvaM ~MvEda# vAruqNO vA aqgnirupa#naddhaq udu# tiShTha svaddhvarOqd^^rdhva Uq ShuNa# Uqtayaq iti# sAviqtrIByAqmut ti#ShThati saviqtRupra#sUta EqvAsyOqd^^rdhvAM ~Mva#ruNamEqnimuth sRu#jatiq dvAByAqM prati#ShThityaiq sa jAqtO garBO# asiq - [  ] 23
